reviewText: I ordered this Hero DVD from ThriftBooks, but instead received what looks like used a mystery romance book in some language I can't recognize (Urdu?) with someone's airline ticket inside -- I'm not a happy customer, and am trying to resolve with seller.

I love this movie.  I bought this copy to replace my first one because it no longer plays properly.  The cover is nearly identical , but this is the Malaysia version
and the subtitles are poor.  The picture quality is fine, so if subs aren't important just get it.
